The game works fine, but when installed along with Assassin's Creed 2 and applied the crack for the game (AC2), this game stutters in-game. 

I've first installed AC:Brotherhood and played it. It works just fine. But when I had AC2 installed and applied its crack, AC:Brotherhood began stuttering in-game due to fluctuating FPS as shown by Fraps, while AC2 itself isn't affected. I'm thinking it has something to do with the crack for AC2 that affects AC:Brotherhood so. Anyone experienced the same thing?
